name: Professional Farmer: American Dream
description: Professional Farmer: American Dream – the latest spin-off from the Professional Farmer series – takes you to a ranch set in the captivating landscapes of the Midwest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Dualcore, AMD X2 Dualcore with 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 4870 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8, 10, 64-bit Processor: Intel i-series Quadcore, AMD FX-series Quadcore with 3.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon HD R9 270X Storage: 4 GB available space
